website_summaries.verdict: The “man in black” of watches. Cool and stylish, the Alliance features a snappy, very dark gray/black dial and black leather band, offering up a clean, upscale look without feeling heavy or stuffy.
pros: This is a great, sophisticated, everyday watch and an excellent value
Elegant and durable, the Alliance complements almost any suit or dress shirt, but easily matches casual wear as well
Water-resistant to 300 feet (100 meters), with a 2-year warranty if ordered from Amazon
cons: Some users have had trouble with getting warranty repair and replacement
Some wearers report premature wear of the leather band

customer_reviews.title: This watch was purchased from Perfect Timing and was promptly received and expertly packaged
customer_reviews.text: This watch was purchased from Perfect Timing and was promptly received and expertly packaged. The watch is beautiful. It has a very clean face with numbers at 3, 6, 9 and the Swiss Army shield at 12. The luminescence of the face and hands are easy to read in low light. This is my current favorite watch. I get comments all the time on its clean looks and function. I must admit that for the price it was simply to good to pass up; especially given the quality of the time piece. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: The watch is beautiful but be sure to read your warranty details and ...
customer_reviews.text: READ YOUR WARRANTY DETAILS! Do not purchase this item from an unauthorized Victorinox retailer. I purchased the watch from seller "CoolChrono". This seller offers a one year limited warranty but the manufacturer offers a five year warranty if the item is purchased from an authorized retailer. Fourteen months after my purchase, the watch stopped working. Because CoolChrono is not an authorized Victorinox retailer I could not get any warranty repair through Victorinox. CoolChrono refused to provide any warranty because I was (barely) past the one year purchase date. The watch is beautiful but be sure to read your warranty details and purchase the item from an authorized retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Athena B. Troy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice watch and makes a great formal watch to wear.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say anything bad about this watch it a very nice looking watch and I wear it when I go out to dinner or movie or some kind of fuction that requires dressing up a little. The movement is really clean cannot say anything bad about it the unit kepts great time. Watchmaker that I gave it to set it up said it will hold at about +2 second a day or better and I thought that was pretty good. So I am happy with this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Case

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice watch.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch. Looks better in person than pictures. It's my everyday watch and looks good for work or casual wear. Wasnt sure about buying a nice watch from a dealer that wasnt Victorinox Authorized Dealer but it was Prime and I knew Amazon would take it back if it wasnt real. I took it and had it certified before I took the tags off, the real deal, not a cheap imitation. After 4 months it hasnt even lost a full minute yet, very acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch is absolutely beautiful in person. The pictures do not do it justice at all. What you don't see is that the markers and hands are polished, which provides a lovely sparkle. The bezel is also polished, along with portions of the band. The face itself is a deep, dark grey, not a true black. There is a definite sophistication in the simplicity of this watch. Quality, beauty, simplicity... couldn't ask for more. Plus, Amazon had this shipped and on my wrist within 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: MWY

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I saw it at a local store and decided to take a chance on the watch as an every day wear. So far it's been months and I haven't had any issues with it. People are always making comments about how sleek and nice it looks. Overall I highly recommend it. -----UPDATE----- It's been over a year since my original review and the watch is still going strong. Its very durable, I wear it almost every day and aside from a few scratches around the edges it is still in great condition. I would definitely recommend this watch to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: ITrob523

customer_reviews.title: A nice timepiece
customer_reviews.text: I've had this watch for 4-5 months now. I love the look an feel of this watch. Although I have small wrists, it doesn't look or feel largely disproportionate when I wear it. It is more like a dark gray face close-up, but it could pass as black anywhere else. The only issue I have about this is the price of the band. Last time I checked the band was ~$175+ for the stainless steel band. The band also scuffs easily (for me, scuffing occurs on the bottom of my wrist). It isn't noticeable, but when you are staring at this watch every time you wear it, you notice the blemishes that form.
customer_reviews.author: Synonymtoast

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery
customer_reviews.text: The battery died after 2 months of purchase and upon contacting the seller, he refused to do anything and asked me instead to visit a local store for the replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Vishrant Gupta

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stitching
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and it was a hit, particularly the stitching on the sides. It is kind of bulky though.. more so than expected but not more than I guess most men's watches are. NOTE: when I bought it I thought the face was dark blue (it looks blue on my computer) but it's actually black.. still very nice.
customer_reviews.author: K.R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Watch looks great in person. Only complaint is that the watch band scratches very easily. Some light office work put quite a few scratches on the bottom of the band. Looked into buying a new one, and it would cost almost as much as the watch is selling for on this site. I really like the watch, but would have liked to know the surface scuffs easily.
customer_reviews.author: RTG

customer_reviews.title: Great value - looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a great value. I wanted a nice watch, but wasn't ready to dish out thousands for a Tag Heuer etc. This watch retails in departments stores for $475, and I was able to get it from amazon at ~$300. Thus far, I am nothing but pleased. A very simple yet elegant look and is a perfect weight. The watch comes in a very nice storage box that can be used for traveling or for overnight sotrage. I absolutely recommend this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: The watch will stop working in about 4 - 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't by this product. Read all the bad reviews it has (one star). Your watch WILL stop workin in about 4 - 6 months. My seller was Perfect Timing. It is sad that Amazon allows bad products.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Balbuena

customer_reviews.title: Excellent watch, looks sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: You can’t go wrong with Victorinox. Excellent watch, looks sophisticated.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this watch. It is beautiful and well made. However, the band was very small. I have an average size wrist. I measured my wrist and it is 7 3/4". I have used many watches in the past, where I normally have to remove links from the band to get a good fit. I am wondering if the one that was shipped was a returned item where someone removed links.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsaco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch for the price. Not stunning, but damn good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Atlas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Classic Watch
customer_reviews.text: I really love how this watch looks. The metal accents sparkle very nicely in the light. The leather for the straps is not very soft, but I think that's a good thing for durability. It keeps the time very well, I haven't had to adjust the time yet (except for Day Light Saving's time).
customer_reviews.author: squartTwoThree

customer_reviews.title: Great size, ample sized band for large wrists and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size, ample sized band for large wrists and good weight. Blue face is a great color. True blue rather than a grey blue. Very nice watch for dress or casual.
customer_reviews.author: p12lr54

customer_reviews.title: I bought thiswatch for my husband and he is kinda picky when ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband and he is kinda picky when come to thing like a watch because he doesn't like to wear a watch but when i got this watch for him and he was so happy and gave me a Big smile and so i know that he really like this watch and it's look very nice on him and i like it a lot and it's not take so long time to Delivery only 5 days. I love it !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: prakaithip crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent time piece for the money! I wanted a classic, simple looking watch without spending too much money and this watch is perfect! The face isn't too big and the stitching on the leather is top notch. It's comfortable and keeps excellent time so far. I'd recomend this for somebody who wants a quality time piece but doesn't want anything too flashy.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is really stunning -- very hip looking, simple elegant. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Astounded

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch for very limited time
customer_reviews.text: Band broke after about a year. Minute hand started moving every 4 seconds roughly 18 months in. Watch completely dead within 2 years. Tried replacing the battery to no effect. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Iloveblizzards

customer_reviews.title: Bad metal strap
customer_reviews.text: Everything is ok but the metal strap, it keeps opening
customer_reviews.author: Gianpiero Silva

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: The product was not new like suggested. It was slight used as I could see finger prints on the dial. The product wrist band was also slight used. With that being said the price and product worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mattataz

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks even better on your hand than online. Very stylish and can fit well in formal and casual settings. However, the only slight drawback is that the seconds ticker doesn't exactly align perfectly with the markings around the dial. Other than that, it is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Simply Elegant
customer_reviews.text: Simply elegant. Didn't know how striking and clean this piece was until it came. I am wearing it often.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Just one time the double lock snapped. Hope it doesn't happen again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years it started to run slow intermittently. Changed batteries but didn't solve the problem. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: The Gimp

customer_reviews.title: Graduation gift and he LOVES it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This watch is a stunning watch to look at in person. A family member really wanted this watch. He tried it on at a department store first so I did not have to worry about sizing. He mainly uses this watch for graduate school. I've seen it on him and it seems to match well with his style. Loos very professional. I don't believe there's any luminescence, but this is more aimed for a day watch than night time. Build quality looks and feels like it will last a long time. Hopefully long enough for him to graduate and upgrade to an even nicer watch!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: I have a much more expensive watch and wanted a similar looking watch in black. I love this watch. Sharp looking, great band and gets a lot of compliments. Very comfortable to wear and not too large. Amazon's price was the best I could find. Would buy it again. Great quality and price. Beautiful piece !
customer_reviews.author: gnscc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This appears to be a really great watch. I have loved it so far. No bad comments.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pressnall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch that looks even better than the picture, keeps excellent time, at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Nino

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch
customer_reviews.text: This watch looks great and is very comfortable. I wear it to work and casually on the weekend. The stainless steel gives the watch shine, and the black gives it subtle elegance.
customer_reviews.author: Jer

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime warranty
customer_reviews.text: Very good build quality and look. Two years with it and still not a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Halder Labarrere

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch, bought this as a gift and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch, bought this as a gift and it was received very well, he wears it all the time and gets a lot of compliments. The only issue is that the clasp is a bit loose, it opens a lot when his wrist bends.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Casey

customer_reviews.title: It truly is a beautiful piece of jewelry as well as an accurate time ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch for my husband for our 2nd wedding anniversary nearly a year ago and he absolutely LOVES it and wears it daily. It truly is a beautiful piece of jewelry as well as an accurate time piece, and he is STILL thanking me for giving it to him. He says it is very comfortable and he wears it with anything from jeans to formal suits. He helped me select this particular watch because he prefers one that doesn't have too many dials and extaneous features - he just wanted an easy-to-read dial with the time and date, and a sweeping second hand that had a clean and classic look but wasn't outrageously expensive. This was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch. I've had it for about a month and it's become my everyday work watch. It light on my wrist, and doesn't draw attention to itself. Looks great with black or brown shoes and belt. Very classy.
customer_reviews.author: BrotherJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a beautiful and shiny watch. I love it. It came perfectly packed, and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: ... husband thought it was a very classy watch and loved the way it look for wearing to the
customer_reviews.text: My husband thought it was a very classy watch and loved the way it look for wearing to the office
customer_reviews.author: Donna Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The watch fits seamlessly around my wrist. It look much more than its worth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome watch, ordered it for my husband for Xmas ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch, ordered it for my husband for Xmas and he loves it. The order arrived on time and everything was in original packaging. Good for thinner wrists also
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: This is a very handsomewatch with a simple
customer_reviews.text: This is a very handsome watch with a simple, elegant, easy to read face. I've owned 4 other Swiss Army watches over the years, and all gave good service for about 5 years each before they had to be replaced, not bad considering their inexpensive cost, never more than $200. This new watch is a bit more expensive and looks it! I would not hesitate to buy it again. I have only 2 minor complaints: the date window is very tiny and thus difficult to read, and the watchband is very stiff, making it difficult to fit the end through the retainers once the band has been buckled
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: simply elegant. it glows in the dark ( completely ...
customer_reviews.text: simply elegant. it glows in the dark ( completely dark). its size is not too big and not too small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality watch.
customer_reviews.text: The watch is well made & I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Wagih

customer_reviews.title: Beatiful Swiss time piece
customer_reviews.text: This watch is good quality, the indigo lights up nicely. The strap takes a little while to break in but after it fits like a glove. The only problem I have with mine is the strap clip makes a little sound when I poke the pin thru the hole, no big deal I barely notice it. I have small wrists and the diameter of the watch face is just perfect. It's a beautiful time piece and you can wear it for any occasion. You'll get noting but compliments and it comes in a cool package.
customer_reviews.author: Fatih Demir

customer_reviews.title: You can wear this watch with anything and its a perfect fit. I get compliments every time i wear ...
customer_reviews.text: it dresses up and it dresses down. You can wear this watch with anything and its a perfect fit. I get compliments every time i wear it. Just buy the watch. DO IT
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Such a classy looking watch, works amazing and looks amazing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the watch. It's beautiful and works well with both formal and casual clothes. The leather is soft. However, the luminousity of the second measures is 99% non-existent. And the second hand does not _quite_ align with the second marks, but it's only noticeable if you really look for it. I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Ahsan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love th price and the watch has clean and neat looking. Would match with almost anything
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Robbin Bistro

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: The face of this timepiece is gorgeous! It goes with jeans and a business suite equally well. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very solid watch and looks great with work or casual attire
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Very solid watch and looks great with work or casual attire
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: An dressier watch for an officer and a gentleman!
customer_reviews.text: It's simple elegant and dressy. If you like Swiss Army,and Victorinox in particular , this watch is all business....forget Rolex !
customer_reviews.author: NWA10000

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I have had the watch for only a couple of weeks and do not wear it every day, so still getting used to it. I know there have been posts about the quality of the leather band but it feels sturdy to me. The leather is stiff and hopefully will become more pliable over time with wear. I love the look of the watch - I wanted something casual but a bit distinctive, and this watch fits that bill.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Watch.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch about a month ago, and I only have awesome comments about it. It has a good look, the bessel is polished and gives the watch a strong and heavy attitude. The dial is absolutly beautiful, in the picture it looks black, but when the light hits it directly, it looks like grey. It fits good with Casual Dress, as well with Formal Dress.
customer_reviews.author: GUnit

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quartz movement watch for the price. Keep a close eye on this watch on Azon because the price fluctuates daily. Nice leather band. Easy to set date. Nice face. My wrist is 7 inches so 40mm face is as big as you can go with this watch. Very nice indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Don Jr

customer_reviews.title: Simple, nice, elegant!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this watch. It has a great look, and the price is good for such a quality watch. It came packaged in the Victorinox box, and looks new. The band is a nice thick black leather band. This is a gift for my guy's birthday, and I wanted something simple and elegant that I could engrave on the back. My only issue was that I had to order the watch twice. The post office lost the first package.
customer_reviews.author: Sway

customer_reviews.title: Strap pins too small
customer_reviews.text: The watch itself is very nice. I've dropped it several times on various surfaces and has no noticeable scratches. However, the reason I keep dropping it is because the pins in the strap are far too small and any remotely vigorous movement sends the watch flying off my hand.
customer_reviews.author: B. Han

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Can Wear With Anything
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very classy and well-made. I can wear with anything. The dial is beautiful, grayish-black. I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Great looking watch!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch! it looks amazing and I've received many compliments about it. It is what u see here, The band is a little stiff at first but it usually wears in with time. Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Barry Persad

customer_reviews.title: face should be smaller. everyone wants a big flashy ...
customer_reviews.text: face should be smaller. everyone wants a big flashy shiny watch due to small .. face should be smaller.
customer_reviews.author: punkin

customer_reviews.title: Classic timepiece. Get it now!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome classic time piece that goes with any dress situation. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan corcio

customer_reviews.title: Good basic watch for the price.
customer_reviews.text: What I expected except the description stated 22mm band width and it is really 20mm.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus Prime

customer_reviews.title: Damaged/Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: The Second-hand clock stopped working in exact four months. The watch completely stopped working, and it has only been six months. It's an expensive watch to work for six months only, and go through all the hassle of dealing with the warranty company. Very bad experience with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ramita

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful watch for the money
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch for the money. I'm a watch freak with two Swatches, a Tag Heaur, Breitling, and Blanc Pain Arrived in a great box safe and sound. The leather strap is comfortable and not too hard The face is really nice with big numbers. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jack R.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, I like it, but I am not high key person, and a little heavy to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought a new band and this is my new favorite watch.
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece, mediocre band. Bought a new band and this is my new favorite watch.
customer_reviews.author: Sascoa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can't return, it is just about ok, the belt is too hard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product was failed. When i wear the watch ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was failed. When i wear the watch its open and is impossible to use it. Its so unconfortable. How can i do to exchange it? Please answer me.
customer_reviews.author: juan chesi

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: The watches is very nice. exactly what my expectation was. The only thing is that the warranty paper doesn't have stamp. How to get it to start warranty term ?
customer_reviews.author: yulia capar

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: We have no negatives regarding this watch - it is easy to read, a good size, elegant and provides just the right amount of information. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Drusilla Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: Great watch, is elegant, i don't know what more tho said,
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent But...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch but I started getting random black marks on my pants and shirt. I went crazy trying to find the cause and eventually discovered it is the watch strap. I guess this would be expected being brand new but its been several weeks and it is still leaving marks! I just want to warn people that may be buying this for a nice event, you may show up with dirty looking cloths from this watch.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Young

customer_reviews.title: Good price and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions, materials and finished product are very good. really looks like a clock with elegance and style.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Alvarez Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: try to replace battery and watch is not working ........
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: As the owner of several fairly good watches, I was looking for a change for an everyday watch. When the watch came, it was wayyyy nicer than the pic conveys. This is a great looking, nice quality timepiece at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: DLEE
